00021 from Engine                 import splitter

00023 class ConfirmationPage(rend.Page):
00024     head = [ T.title ["QSOS evaluation Upload"] ]
00025     body = [ T.h1 [ "Your evaluation has been uploaded" ] ,
00026              T.a ( href = "../" ) [ "Go to Repository Main Page" ],
00027              " or ",
00028              T.a ( href = "../submit" ) [ "Upload another evaluation" ]
00029             ]
00030     docFactory = loaders.stan( T.html[ T.head [ head ], T.body [ body ] ] )
00031     
00032 
00033 class UploadPage(rend.Page):
00034     docFactory = loaders.xmlstr("""
00035 <!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Strict//EN"
00036            "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-strict.dtd">
00037 <html xmlns:n="http://nevow.com/ns/nevow/0.1">
00038     <head>
00039         <title>Example 1: A News Item Editor</title>
00040     </head>
00041     <body>
00042         <h1>Example 1: A News Item Editor</h1>
00043         <n:invisible n:render="fileUploader" />
00044     </body>
00045 </html>
00046 """)
00047     
00048 
00049 
00050     def __init__(self, *args, **kwargs):
00051         super(UploadPage, self).__init__(*args, **kwargs)
00052     
00053     def submitEvaluation(self, **newsItemData):
00054         qsos = newsItemData["File"].file.read()
00055         qsos = "".join([line.strip() for line in (qsos.splitlines())]) 
00056         splitter.parse(qsos,"..")
00057         return url.here.click('submit/confirmation')
00058 
00059     def bind_submitEvaluation(self, ctx):
00060         return [
00061             ('File', annotate.FileUpload(required=True)),
00062         ]
00063 
00064     def render_fileUploader(self, ctx, data):
00065         return ctx.tag.clear()[
00066             webform.renderForms()
00067         ]
00068     
00069     children = {'confirmation'  : ConfirmationPage()}
